      • xmlAttribute

        public static final String xmlAttribute(String name,
                                        String value)
        Will ignore names which are not valid XML attribute names, will escape values properly (you don't need to replace '&' to '&amp;' and such when passing your strings to this method...).
        Parameters:
        name -
        value -
        Returns:
        empty string or a space character with valid XML attribute notation concatenated

      • xmlAttributeFragment

        public static final String xmlAttributeFragment(String string)
        The part of XML attribute text. Example: <div title="title: <%= Format.xmlAttributeFragment( this.title ) %>" > <%= { layout : "link", title : this.title, href : "/!/skin/skin-acmcms-info/jdoc-ae3.sdk/ru/myx/sapi/FormatSAPI.html" } %> </div>
        Parameters:
        string -
        Returns:

      • xmlAttributes

        public static final String xmlAttributes(BaseObject object)
        Makes a string with ' name="value"' parts for every non-Object.prototype's mapping. Values are escaped according to XML specification rules. Illegal attribute names are silently skipped.
        Parameters:
        object -
        Returns:

      • xmlAttributeValue

        public static final String xmlAttributeValue(Object string)
        The while XML attribute including quotes and text. The Date instances are formatted as Format.Ecma.date( x ) Other objects are formatted as x.toString() Example: <div title=<%= Format.xmlAttributeValue( 'Title: ' + this.title ) %> > <%= { layout : "link", title : this.title, href : "/!/skin/skin-acmcms-info/jdoc-ae3.sdk/ru/myx/sapi/FormatSAPI.html" } %> </div>
        Parameters:
        string -
        Returns:

      • xmlElement

        public static final String xmlElement(String name,
                                      BaseObject attributes)
        Makes an xml element with given name, attributes and child elements. This version support child elements as well as attributes:
        • for a value to get into attributes it must be a primitive value;
        • for a value to get into child elements it must be a non-primitive value.
        Supported extras (the value of an attribute or nested value):
        • { layout : 'xml-fragment', content : uncheckedXmlFragment }
        • { layout : 'xml', content : uncheckedXml }
        • { layout : 'final', type : 'text/xml', content : uncheckedXml }
        Parameters:
        name -
        attributes -
        Returns:

      • xmlElements

        public static final String xmlElements(String name,
                                       BaseObject attributes)
        Executes xmlElement zero or more times to build an XML fragment string. No element is produced if attributes equal to 'undefined'. When attributes is an array, xmlElement will be called for each item, unless that item is 'undefined' or primitive. For primitive values of an attribute the element with text content is produced.
        Parameters:
        name -
        attributes -
        Returns:

      • xmlNodeValue

        nodeValue - element's body. Example: <textarea> <%= Format.xmlNodeValue( this.text ) %> </textarea>
        Parameters:
        o -
        Returns:
        string
